slides.title: Title
slides.content: Canned Water - Sustainable Hydration for a Thirsty Planet

slides.title: Problem
slides.content: Plastic water bottles contribute significantly to pollution, landfill waste, and microplastic contamination. Consumers are increasingly aware and seeking sustainable alternatives, but convenient and readily available options are limited. Investors recognize the growing consumer demand for eco-friendly products, but lack readily available options for scalable and impact-driven water solutions.

slides.title: Solution
slides.content: Canned Water offers a premium, sustainable alternative to plastic bottles. We provide purified water in infinitely recyclable aluminum cans, addressing environmental concerns and offering a stylish and convenient hydration solution. Our canning process ensures freshness and preserves the water's purity, while our sleek can design appeals to environmentally conscious consumers. We are building partnerships with distributors and retailers to ensure widespread availability and accessibility.

slides.title: Market
slides.content: The bottled water market is a multi-billion dollar industry. Our target market includes environmentally conscious millennials and Gen Z, as well as retailers and distributors seeking sustainable beverage options. The addressable market for sustainable water alternatives is rapidly expanding, presenting a significant opportunity for growth and market leadership. We estimate a serviceable obtainable market (SOM) of $XX million within the first three years, focusing on key metropolitan areas with strong environmental awareness.

slides.title: Business Model
slides.content:
Our revenue streams include: 
*   Direct-to-consumer sales (online)
*   Wholesale distribution to retailers (grocery stores, convenience stores, restaurants, gyms)
*   Partnerships with events and organizations
*   Potential for branded partnerships and private label opportunities. 
We aim to achieve profitability through efficient manufacturing, strategic distribution partnerships, and effective marketing campaigns. Our goal is to capture a significant share of the growing sustainable beverage market and generate strong returns for our investors.
